long_description: If you need ultraviolet (UV) light for your hobby or profession, look no further than the Inova Microlight UV keychain flashlight. High-powered 365 - 400 nanometer UV LED can be used to detect counterfeit bills and IDs and spot fluorescent dyes; can even be used when hunting or investigating a crime scene. LED has a 1,000 hr. life and operates in 4 modes: high, low, strobe and emergency signal. 2 user-replaceable 2016 lithium batteries (included) provide up to 10 hrs. of use. Impact- and water-resistant body ensures the light will stand up to your active lifestyle. Inova Microlight UV keychain flashlight includes a durable stainless-steel clip so you can attach the light to keys, a pack strap or zipper pull. Protect your skin and eyes when using this light; exposure to UV radiation can be harmful to your health.
short_description: If you need ultraviolet (UV) light for your hobby or profession, look no further than the Inova Microlight UV keychain flashlight.
